# decodeNil()

**Instance Method**

Decodes a null value.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func decodeNil() throws -> Bool
```

## Return Value

Whether the encountered value was null.

## Discussion

If the value is not null, does not increment currentIndex.
title: decodeNil()
